metadata.synopsis: Omeluum joins the party after he's freed.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Use the lever (S_IRN_PrisonerGroup9_Lever_22db60cd-b212-4763-aaa9-fb833b5f63a9)  to release Omeluum, which will free them and play the AD.

0.speaker: Omeluum
0.text: We will talk later. Now, we must leave. Quickly.
